name: 9th International Academic Conference on Humanities and Social Sciences
content: The 9th International Academic Conference on Humanities and Social Sciences is a must-attend event for the academic community. Join us on the 23-25 of February in the dynamic city of Milan. IACHSS continues to recruit top speakers in the field, showcase findings from the latest research, and provide premier networking opportunities. Scientists, researchers, members of academia, non-profits, and government organizations from all over the world will come together for cross-border learning and the exchange of ideas. Discover the latest trends and challenges in the industry, network with the leading minds, and share your knowledge with members of the community. Finally, spend a day exploring Paris on a free tour weâ€™ll be organizing for all participants.
